description: This file defines the exported API functions for the Dslh Helper Container Object in a DSL Home Model implementation. It includes function prototypes for creating, removing, enrolling objects, and initializing the helper container, and serves as an interface for other parts of the system to interact with the container object.

methods.name: DslhCreateHelperContainer
methods.description: Creates a helper container object with specified context and reservation handles.

methods.name: DslhHcoCreate
methods.description: Creates a new instance of the helper container object with given context and handles.

methods.name: DslhHcoRemove
methods.description: Removes and deallocates the helper container object.

methods.name: DslhHcoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls or registers necessary objects within the helper container.

methods.name: DslhHcoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the helper container object, setting up initial state.
